resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-analyst-estimates
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Analyst Estimates
resourceTemplates.description: Fetch earnings per share analyst estimates for a stock ticker. Required: ticker. Optional: period (annual or quarterly).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-company-facts
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Company Facts
resourceTemplates.description: Get company facts by ticker and/or CIK.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-crypto-price-snapshot
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Crypto Price Snapshot
resourceTemplates.description: Get real-time cryptocurrency price snapshot. Required: ticker (for example BTC-USD).

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-crypto-prices
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Crypto Prices (Historical)
resourceTemplates.description: Get ranged cryptocurrency price data. Required: ticker, interval, interval_multiplier, start_date, end_date. Optional: limit.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-earnings-press-releases
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Earnings Press Releases
resourceTemplates.description: Get earnings press releases for a ticker. Required: ticker.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-metrics
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Financial Metrics
resourceTemplates.description: Get historical financial metrics and ratios. Required: ticker, period (annual, quarterly, ttm). Optional: limit.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-metrics-snapshot
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Financial Metrics Snapshot
resourceTemplates.description: Get a real-time snapshot of financial metrics and ratios. Required: ticker.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-income-statements
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Income Statements
resourceTemplates.description: Get income statements. Required: ticker, period (annual, quarterly, ttm). Optional: limit, cik.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-balance-sheets
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Balance Sheets
resourceTemplates.description: Get balance sheets. Required: ticker, period (annual, quarterly, ttm). Optional: limit, cik.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-cash-flow-statements
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Cash Flow Statements
resourceTemplates.description: Get cash flow statements. Required: ticker, period (annual, quarterly, ttm). Optional: limit, cik.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-all-financials
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - All Financial Statements
resourceTemplates.description: Get all financial statements. Required: ticker, period (annual, quarterly, ttm). Optional: limit, cik.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-insider-trades
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Insider Trades
resourceTemplates.description: Get insider trades for a ticker. Required: ticker. Optional: limit.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-institutional-ownership
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Institutional Ownership
resourceTemplates.description: Get institutional ownership by investor or ticker. Use either investor or ticker, not both. Optional: limit.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-interest-rates-historical
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Interest Rates (Historical)
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve historical interest rates for a central bank. Required: bank. Optional: start_date, end_date.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-interest-rates-snapshot
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Interest Rates Snapshot
resourceTemplates.description: Retrieve the latest published central-bank interest rate snapshot.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-news
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Company News
resourceTemplates.description: Get real-time and historical news for a ticker. Required: ticker. Optional: start_date, end_date, limit.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-filings
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - SEC Filings
resourceTemplates.description: Get SEC filings by ticker and/or CIK, optionally filtered by filing_type.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-filing-items
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - SEC Filing Items
resourceTemplates.description: Get SEC filing items. Required: ticker, filing_type (10-K or 10-Q), year. Optional: quarter (for 10-Q), item.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-segmented-revenues
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Segmented Revenues
resourceTemplates.description: Get segmented revenue data. Required: ticker, period (annual or quarterly). Optional: limit, cik.

resourceTemplates.name: aisa-financial-stock-prices
resourceTemplates.title: AIsa Financial - Stock Prices (Historical)
resourceTemplates.description: Get ranged stock price data. Required: ticker, interval, interval_multiplier, start_date, end_date. Optional: limit.
